titleStmt.title: The famous and delectable history of Cleocreton & Cloryana wherein is set forth the noble and heroick actions of Cleocreton Prince of Hungary, his vvonderful and vvarlike atchievements in sundry kingdoms. Herein is also declared, his constant love to the most beautiful princess Cloryana, the onely daughter of the Emperor of Persia.
titleStmt.author: S. C.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J.B. for Charls Tyus, at the three Bibles on London-Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The pleasant history of Cleocreton and Cloryana.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
Identified as STC 4302 on UMI microfilm "Early English books, 1475-1640".
